SELECT alnum, m.memberNum, subject, imageFile,name,created,content FROM moimalbum m JOIN member2 b ON m.membernum = b.membernum WHERE alnum=#{alnum}

SELECT tb.* FROM( SELECT alnum, subject FROM moimalbum m JOIN member2 b ON m.memberNum=b.memberNum
AND (alnum > #{alnum})
ORDER BY alnum ASC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1

SELECT tb.* FROM( SELECT alnum, subject FROM moimalbum m JOIN member2 b ON m.memberNum=b.memberNum
AND (alnum < #{alnum})
ORDER BY alnum DESC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1
